Pre-Game Insights: England and Australia have played 4 matches in the series, with both teams winning 2 matches each.

Harry Brook was the Man of the Match in the previous encounter and Matthew Potts scored the highest fantasy points for England with 124 match fantasy points while Mitchell Marsh topped the fantasy points leaderboard for Australia with 61 match fantasy points.

The pitch at The Seat Unique Stadium, Bristol will allow for good stroke play and the batters will find it easy to bat on the surface. The surface will not allow a lot of assistance to the bowlers and wicket taking is not going to be easy.

The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 243 runs. Both teams will look to chase upon winning the toss as the majority of the games played on this ground have been won by the side chasing.
Temperature will hover around 14.41 °C and humidity is expected to be around 63%. Winds at a speed of 7.47 m/s are expected. Cloud cover expected, so expect some movement to aid the pace bowlers.

Pacers have been very successful at this venue. They have taken 67% of the total wickets at this venue. We would suggest that you pick as many pace bowlers as possible in your team. Based on the stats available, we predict that the pitch will continue to assist the pacers.
In the 160 matches played between these 2 teams, Australia Batters have earned the most fantasy points for their team, while All Rounders have earned the most fantasy points for England.
